field.name: jquery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: Enable or disable jQuery latest version.

field.name: scrolltop
field.label: Back to Top
field.description: Enable or disable Back to Top button. This requires jQuery plugin.

field.name: superfish
field.label: Superfish Menu Effect
field.description: Enable or disable Supperfish effect for main navigation menu. This requires jQuery plugin.

field.name: logotype
field.label: Logo Type
field.description: Choose the type of the logo you want to display.

field.name: logo
field.label: Logo Image
field.description: Please choose an image. If you want to display the original logo from the template, click on Clear and leave the field blank.

field.name: sitetitle
field.label: Logo Text
field.description: Please add your site title here, it's only displayed if you don't use a the text logo option.

field.name: sitedesc
field.label: Site Description
field.description: Add your site's description here. Leave it blank to disable.

field.name: fluid
field.label: Fluid Width
field.description: This option will make the template width fluid.

field.name: width
field.label: Template Width
field.description: Set template with in pixles. This will take effect only if the width is NOT fluid. ie: 960

field.name: headerheight
field.label: Header Height
field.description: Height of the header area. Maximum value 500. ie: 150

field.name: fonts
field.label: Font Family
field.description: Choose a font style for headings, logo and menus.

field.label: Values are in pixles / px. Please insert only values and do not use any size for fonts like px, em, etc...

field.name: psize
field.label: Basic Font Size
field.description: Add the text size for paragraphs. This is the basic text.

field.name: logosize
field.label: Logo Font Size
field.description: Insert font size of text logo. Not applicable for image logo.

field.name: descsize
field.label: Desciption Font Size
field.description: Font size of site description.

field.name: h1
field.label: Heading 1
field.description: Heading 1 / H1 font size.

field.name: h2
field.label: Heading 2
field.description: Heading 2 / H2 font size.

field.name: h3
field.label: Heading 3
field.description: Heading 3 / H3 font size.

field.name: h4
field.label: Heading 4,5,6
field.description: Heading 4,5,6 / H4,H5,H6 font size.

field.name: menusize
field.label: Menu Font Size
field.description: Choose a font size for horizontal and sidebar menus.

field.name: menubg
field.label: Menu Background
field.description: Select background color.

field.name: menubghover
field.label: Menu BG Hover / Active
field.description: Select background color.

field.name: menulink
field.label: Menu Link
field.description: Select background color.

field.name: menulinkhover
field.label: Menu Link Hover / Active
field.description: Select background color.

field.name: bgcolor
field.label: Background
field.description: Select website background color.

field.name: textcolor
field.label: Text Color
field.description: Color of paragraph text.

field.name: linkcolor
field.label: Link Color
field.description: Select color of link.

field.name: linkhovercolor
field.label: Link Hover Color
field.description: Select color of hovered link.

field.name: headerbgcolor
field.label: Header Background
field.description: Select background color of header area.

field.name: headertextcolor
field.label: Header Text
field.description: Select text color of header area.

field.name: contentbgcolor
field.label: Content Background
field.description: Select background color of content area.

field.name: articleinfo
field.label: Article Info
field.description: Color of article info text.

field.name: headingcolor
field.label: Headings
field.description: H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6 general colors.
